entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except north 60 km/h gusting to 80 over southern sections. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Rain beginning late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
